name: ADC/DAC Converters
description: Sub-sector template for data converter patents (CPC H03M*) including ADCs, DACs, and sigma-delta converters.
contextDescription: Data converter patents cover the interface between analog and digital domains. Key types include SAR ADC, pipeline ADC, sigma-delta ADC, and various DAC architectures. Every sensor, audio, video, and communication system needs converters. High-value targets include Analog Devices, Texas Instruments, all smartphone SoC vendors, and automotive sensor systems.
scoringGuidance: High-speed ADC patents target 5G, radar, and data center applications.
Audio ADC/DAC patents are in every device with sound.
Sensor interface ADCs target IoT, automotive, and industrial markets.
Sigma-delta converters dominate precision and audio applications.
Power-efficient converters are critical for mobile and wearables.

questions.question: What converter architecture does this patent cover (SAR, pipeline, sigma-delta, flash)? Score by prevalence.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the converter architecture and its applications.

questions.question: What resolution/speed class? Score: 1-3 for low-res/slow, 4-6 for medium (12-14 bit), 7-10 for high-speed (>1Gsps) or high-res (>16 bit).
questions.reasoningPrompt: High-speed and high-resolution converters command premium pricing.

questions.question: How broadly applicable is this converter technology? Consider audio, video, sensors, communications.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Converters are needed everywhere. Assess application breadth.

questions.question: Does this patent improve power efficiency (Walden FOM, Schreier FOM)? Critical for mobile.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Power efficiency is the key differentiator for mobile converters.
